values: （乡间的）小径；（尤指打猎时跟踪的）踪迹；（长串的）痕迹；（植物的）蔓；（通过野外的）远足路线；（飞机或船只的）尾流；（悬挂或拖在地面的）悬垂部分
拖拉；拖曳；拖拽；追踪；跟踪；（在比赛或其他竞赛中）落后；失利；徒步穿越；慢慢移动；缓缓行进；蔓延；蔓生；事先宣传；预告；喷洒；洒落；（尤指跟在他人后面）疲惫地走；磨蹭

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 后面的；拖尾的；牵引的；被拖动的；蔓延的
拖车；[电视] 预告片；追踪者
乘拖车式活动房屋旅行

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指市区外可以通行各种机动车辆的交通干线。
指从此处通往彼处的路线、路程等。
在美国，指城市中一侧或两侧建筑物林立的大道或马路；而在英国则常指通住乡村大住宅、私人大庄园或两旁栽树的道路。
指人或兽在森林、荒野或山中踩出的小径或崎岖小道。
尤指城市中的道路，往往一侧或两侧有高大建筑物；还可指城市小镇、近郊可供人、车、马行走的平坦道路。
多指由人或动物在田间、小丘或树丛中经常走动而踩出的小路，也指公园或花园等供人走的小径。
高速公路，新词，特指为车辆快速通行而修的专线，美语为freeway或expressway。
普通用词，含义广泛，可指各种路、道或通道，也可指抽象的道路。
指连接两地间供行人或车辆使用的广阔平坦的大道，多指公路，也可用于引申意义。
在英国，多指街道两旁的人行道，而美国人常用sidewlk表示人行道。
指农村或城镇的小道或小径，也指小巷。
指坚持不懈、毫不动摇地紧跟、追赶某人、某物或某个事业。
指根据线索或足迹进行跟踪。用于抽象意义时指找到某事物的根源。
指沿着人或动物留下的印迹或行迹追踪。
原义为“追猎、猎取”，现用于指追捕或搜寻逃犯等。
指快速追赶或决心追踪，褒义贬义均可用。
普遍用词，含义最广，多指跟随起引导作用的人或物，跟随的动机可以是善意的，也可能是恶意的。

word_group.brief_definition: 通向自然景点的有标志的小径
水汽尾迹；雾化尾迹；凝结尾迹
竞选过程；竞选途径；竞选轨道
俄勒冈小道；俄勒冈小径；俄勒冈小路
远足小径；远足径；徒步旅行路径
资金路径；资金链；资金来路
流星余迹；流星轨迹；流星痕迹

bilingual.target: 这条小径在树林里分岔了。

bilingual.source: The paths converged into a single trail.
bilingual.target: 小路汇聚成了一条小径。

bilingual.source: The trail was covered with fallen leaves.
bilingual.target: 这条小径上覆盖着落叶。

bilingual.source: Watchout for falling rocks on this trail.
bilingual.target: 在这条小径上小心落石。

bilingual.source: Follow the signpost to reach the hiking trail.
bilingual.target: 跟随路标到达徒步小径。

bilingual.source: The trail is perfect for off-road biking.
bilingual.target: 这条小径非常适合越野骑行。

bilingual.source: She loves to hike on the mountain trail.
bilingual.target: 她喜欢在山间小径上徒步旅行。

bilingual.source: That trail is the curviest one in the park.
bilingual.target: 那条小径是公园里最弯曲的。

bilingual.source: The hikers followed the trail up the mountain.
bilingual.target: 徒步旅行者沿着小径上山。

bilingual.source: We followed the trail through the forest.
bilingual.target: 我们沿着这条小径穿过了森林。

list.abstract: This articleis about paths,tracks or other routes used for travel.For other uses,seeTrail(disambiguation).A hiking trail in autumn Trail is a concept of grapht heory. A trail(also track,byway)is a path with a rough beaten or dirt/stone surface used for travel.Trails may be foruse only by walkersand in some placesare the main access route to remote settlements.Some trails can also be used for hiking,cycling,or cross-country skiing and less of ten for moving cattle and other live stock.

yingyinNormal.en: Nature Sez: Tree's A crowd." Moonlight Walk: Triangle Trail." Riley, Maya, Lucas: Enough Already!
yingyinNormal.zh: 自然说：“三树成林”。哈。月光漫步，三角小径。哈。莱丽、玛雅和卢卡斯，你们真是够了。哈。

yingyinNormal.en: You always have to think about the trail. Oh, I don't think there's any trail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 永远不要忘了中间的串连，我想应该没有任何串连。

yingyinNormal.en: What trail? The trail from the woman you did it with to the woman you hope never finds out who did it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么串连？从跟你做这件事的女人到你千方百计要隐瞒的女人。

yingyinNormal.en: I should go move the car off the trail. You're gonna be okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我得去把车挪走了，你可以吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Thor! The Legionnaire? Trail went cold about a hundred miles out, though it's headed north.
yingyinNormal.zh: 托尔！钢铁军团呢？信号在一百英里外消失了，应该是向北前进的。

yingyinNormal.en: What are your plans now, Governor? Remain in Atlanta? No, Hannah and I are heading back on the trail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 州长先生，您现在打算如何，留在亚特兰大吗？不，我和汉娜要回到竞选活动中。

yingyinNormal.en: Easy. The map says there should be a sign showing the start of the nature trail here. Well done, Daddy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很简单。地图上说这里有标识牌指出这里就是森林小路的起点在这！做得好，猪爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: No, George, I don't think we'll see any dinosaurs. This is the start of the nature trail. We're here. Horray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，乔治，我想我们今天是不会看到恐龙的。这是森林小路的起点。我们到啦！好嘞！

yingyinNormal.en: Starting life as a windswept watering hole on the Pioneer Trail, this is a city that continually beat the odds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们在这里抵抗强风，开拓水源就可证明。这个城市不断地创造奇迹。

yingyinNormal.en: How was it? Oh, just like you'd think. Farkle wandered off the trail, and Maya broke the rules and went after him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 远足怎么样？跟你能想到的差不多。法尔科跟队伍走散了，玛雅违反规定去找他了。

yingyinNormal.en: And Jasmine works at that message place with Phoebe. And Phoebe's friends with Rachel. And that's the trail, I did it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洁丝敏是菲比在按摩中心的同事，菲比是瑞秋的朋友，这就是串连，我找到了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, okay. All right, okay, now, we just have to make sure she doesn't find out some other way. Did you think about the trail?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，好好，我们必须确定她不会从其他渠道知道，你觉得有没有串连？

yingyinNormal.en: Did you get kicked out? No, I just needed to leave. Just the atmosphere. And the cups. Hey, I was right on Sean's trail. Then I lost him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你被踢出来了吗？不，我只是必需离开。因为他的杯子。嘿，我已经跟在肖恩的背后了，但是我还是失去他了。

yingyinNormal.en: He tricked me. He flew over there, and I went after him and slipped off the edge of the trail. I was hanging on by a tree branch. I was hanging by my fingertips.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它使诈了，它又飞走了，然后我再追上去，但是我滑倒了，摔下了小路边，说时迟那时快，我抓住了一个树枝，我单靠着手指尖在那吊着。

yingyinNormal.en: He just hijacked the song. He's on his own trail. Everyone of these guys are composing, rearranging, they're writing and they're playing the melody. They're just…
yingyinNormal.zh: 他完全掌控了这首曲子，其中有他自己的成分。这些人都在作曲，在自我编排，他们这是在创作，在演奏旋律。他们就是…

yingyinNormal.en: After paying your respects at the Big Buddha seek a little enlightenment along the Wisdom Path a trail dedicated to the centuries-old Buddhist scripture, the Heart Sutra.
yingyinNormal.zh: 参拜大佛后，您还可以沿着心经简林走走，这是一条以世代相传的佛教经文心经而建的步行径。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so, this race is in flux, and I can tell you that because I feel it out there on the trail, and it's because of all the hard work we've been doing, but now we have to double down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，竞争已进入多变阶段，我这么说是因为我身处其间感受到了，也因为一直以来我们所付出的艰辛努力，但事到如今我们得加强火力。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 踪迹; 痕迹; 小道

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 踪迹; 痕迹; 小道

examination_example.sentence: When you find yourself weal off a <highlight>trail</highlight>, but not in a completely unfamiliar area, you have to answer two questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你发现自己迷失了方向，但不是在一个完全陌生的领域，你必须回答两个问题。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Trail</highlight> blazes, tire tracks, and other features can lead you to civilization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 痕迹、轮胎印和其他特征可以引导你走向文明。

examination_example.sentence: The use of electronic means of payment leaves an electronic <highlight>trail</highlight> that contains a large amount of personal data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用电子支付手段会留下包含大量个人数据的电子痕迹。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 追踪; 踪迹; 痕迹

examination_example.sentence: Drivers simply drove through the chocolate after the crash, leaving a long chocolate <highlight>trail</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事故后不少车辆直接从巧克力上开了过去，留下了一条很长的巧克力印记。

sense_info_list.en: a path through a countryside; mountain; or forest area; often made or used for a particular purpose

examination_example.sentence: It is a seven-day race, called the Iditarod <highlight>Trail</highlight> and participants stop at Takotna for their obligatory 24-hour rest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一场为期七天的比赛，名为“伊蒂塔罗德小径”，参赛者必须在塔科特纳停下来休息24小时。

examination_example.sentence: They come to clean the Iditarod <highlight>Trail</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们来清理伊蒂塔罗德小径。

examination_example.sentence: Uncertain they could help, Grant and his mother headed down the <highlight>trail</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格兰特和他的母亲不知道能不能帮上忙，便沿着小路走去。
